languages.text: "Я — представитель{mf||ница} фон Валанциус, что владеют Кьявой Гамма, и вправе решать, как с ними поступить. Зевакам приказываю разойтись, прочим — идти в док Альфа-Ро и ждать моих указаний".

traits.locale_text: "Я — представитель{mf||ница} фон Валанциус, что владеют Кьявой Гамма, и вправе решать, как с ними поступить. Зевакам приказываю разойтись, прочим — идти в доки и ждать моих указаний".

languages.text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."
languages.original_text: "Я — представитель{mf||ница} фон Валанциус, что владеют Кьявой Гамма, и вправе решать, как с ними поступить. Зевакам приказываю разойтись, прочим — идти в док Альфа-Ро и ждать моих указаний".

traits.locale_text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to the docks and await further instructions."

"I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}はフォン・ヴァランシウス家の代表者でありキアヴァ・ガンマの主だ。よって、この者たちへの対処を決める権限は{mf|俺|私}にある。野次馬は解散し、それ以外の者はドックアルファ・ローへ行き、{mf|俺|私}からの指示を待て」
languages.original_text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}はフォン・ヴァランシウス家の代表者でありキアヴァ・ガンマの主だ。よって、この者たちへの対処を決める権限は{mf|俺|私}にある。野次馬は解散し、それ以外の者はドックアルファ・ローへ行き、{mf|俺|私}からの指示を待て」

languages.text: “我是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的代表，我代表基亚瓦伽马星的主人，因此我有权决定如何处置这些人。我命令所有围观人员立刻离开。至于剩下的人，去码头那边，等待我进一步指示。”
languages.original_text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."

traits.locale_text: “我是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的代表，我代表基亚瓦伽马星的主人，因此我有权决定如何处置这些人。我命令所有围观人员立刻离开。至于剩下的人，去码头那边，等待我进一步指示。”

languages.text: «Represento a los von Valancius, señores de Kiava Gamma, y por tanto tengo derecho a decidir qué hacer con esta gente. Ordeno que los curiosos se dispersen y que el resto vaya al puerto Alfa-Ro a aguardar nuevas instrucciones».
languages.original_text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."

traits.locale_text: «Represento a los von Valancius, señores de Kiava Gamma, y por tanto tengo derecho a decidir qué hacer con esta gente. Ordeno que los curiosos se dispersen y que el resto vaya al puerto Alfa-Ro a aguardar nuevas instrucciones».

languages.text: « Je représente la famille von Valancius, les maîtres de Kiava Gamma. Je suis donc en droit de décider du sort de ces gens. Que tous les badauds rentrent chez eux. Vous autres, rendez-vous sur le quai Alpha-Rho, puis attendez de nouvelles instructions. »
languages.original_text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."

traits.locale_text: « Je représente la famille von Valancius, les maîtres de Kiava Gamma. Je suis donc en droit de décider du sort de ces gens. Que tous les badauds rentrent chez eux. Vous autres, rendez-vous sur le quai Alpha-Rho, puis attendez de nouvelles instructions. »

languages.text: "Ich repräsentiere das Haus von Valancius, die Herren von Kiava Gamma, und habe daher das Recht, zu entscheiden, was mit diesen Leuten geschehen soll. Ich befehle, dass die Umstehenden sich entfernen, und was den Rest von Euch angeht – geht zum Dock Alpha-Rho und wartet auf weitere Anweisungen."
languages.original_text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."

traits.locale_text: "Ich repräsentiere das Haus von Valancius, die Herren von Kiava Gamma, und habe daher das Recht, zu entscheiden, was mit diesen Leuten geschehen soll. Ich befehle, dass die Umstehenden sich entfernen, und was den Rest von Euch angeht – geht zum Dock Alpha-Rho und wartet auf weitere Anweisungen."

languages.text: "Ben, Kiava Gama'nın efendileri von Valanciusları temsil ediyorum. Dolayısıyla bu insanların akıbetine karar verme yetkim var. Kalabalığın dağılmasını emrediyorum. Sizler de Alfa-Ro Rıhtımı'na gidip talimatlarımı bekleyin."
languages.original_text: "I represent the von Valancius, masters of Kiava Gamma, and thus I have the right to decide what to do with these people. I command the onlookers to disperse, as for the rest of you — go to Dock Alpha-Rho and await further instructions."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Kiava Gama'nın efendileri von Valanciusları temsil ediyorum, dolayısıyla bu insanlara ne olacağına karar verme hakkına sahibim. Kalabalığın dağılmasını emrediyorum. Siz ise Alfa-Rho Rıhtımı'na gidin ve vereceğim talimatları bekleyin."
